name: Ode to Dullness Eau de Parfum
about: Fragrance Family:Warm & Spicy.Scent Type:Warm & Sheer.Key Notes:Badiane, Cashmere Flower, Tonka Bean.Fragrance Description:Imagined and created by Romano Ricci, great-grandson of Nina Ricci, Ode to Dullness brings poetry to the ordinary. It’s a creamy composition of badiane, cashmere flower, sandalwood, and tonka bean—an indisputably cozy scent. Behind the apparent dullness often lies the extraordinary..About the Bottle:The bottle aims to capture the beauty of the mundane. While the blue-gray gradient evokes feelings of calm and serenity, the burgundy touch brings a sense of sophistication and femininity..About the Fragrance:If dullness often has a pejorative interpretation in the west, it invites a completely different sense in Asia. Instead of being a synonym of boringness or insipidity, it displays an array of softness and poetic reflection, inviting us to slow down in the fast-paced life we live in.
ingredients: Alcohol Denat., Aqua (Water), Parfum (Fragrance), Ethylhexyl Salicylate, Butyl Methoxydibenzoylmethane, Coumarin, Alpha-Isomethyl Ionone, Limonene, Farnesol, Citral, Benzyl Benzoate.
how_to_use: Suggested Usage:.-Perfume reacts naturally with the warmth of your body. Apply to pulse points for a bold, longer-lasting intensity..-Apply from a distance and allow the mist to gently fall on skin and work its magic..-Avoid rubbing after application. Heat from friction alters the formulation, causing it to diminish its strength..-It is best to replace your fragrance 12 months after opening in order to ensure that the original scent and intensity remains.

reviews.review_title: A must have in your rotation!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received this product for free from Influenster and Juliette Has a Gun in exchange for my honest review.   Thanks to Influenster, I’ve been able to sample a handful of different fragrances. I love having the opportunity to try new fragrances prior to buying — especially with some of their hefty price tags. Juliette Has A Gun takes #1. This fragrance is advertised as unisex — but don’t let that deter you. It’s neither overly feminine nor overly masculine.  It is such a warm, cozy and inviting scent. I think it’s perfect for fall/winter. Juliette Has a Gun has been and will continue to be a regular in my rotation.  Disclaimer: less is definitely more. I found this product to be very strong.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin

It is fantastic! The packaging and bottle are beautiful. The scent is amazing as well. It's so hard to describe but it works in the best way. It smells like vanilla with spice and other exotic scents. I can't put my finger on it but I love it. It is definitely my go to for date night and I always get compliments when I wear it. Even my kids love when I wear it. It lasts all day too! I can put this on in the morning and I can still smell it on me come dinner time. It's great! So happy it's a part of my scent collection. I definitely want to smell more from this brand! Highly recommend

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I've experienced several perfumes over the decades and have recently been longing for a new discovery. After recently celebrating my birthday, I was happily gifted a free sample of the new Juliette has a gun Ode To Dullness Eau de Parfum, from Influenster in exchange for my honest review, which is simply phenomenal. The packaging for the perfume was pretty in its own simplicity. The box isn't flashy, but had it's own bottle protected well in foam from breakage. The beautiful ombre glass bottle looks and feels high quality and sofisticated with a magnetized gold lid displaying the brand of the perfume and logo on the top, with the brand as well etched into the bottle on the bottom. Furthermore, the glass bottle makes for an attractive display sitting on my vanity. This was my first time being introduced to this brand, so I can't compare it to any of the brand's other frangrances. At first, I was worried it might not be a match with my body chemistry, but it turned out to be perfect. The fragrance is definitely not a dull scent at all and elicits warm, cozy, inviting vibes that are perfect for wearing in the fall and winter seasons. The Sandalwood is earthy and enchanting along with Cashmere, Tonka Bean, Freesia, and Musk, including a spicy, and prominent crisp floral finish adds the right amount of depth to make this a very well-rounded fragrance with the perfect blend of notes. I appreciate the way it makes me feel confident, refreshed, and uplifted. Although this fragrance is classified as a gender neutral unisex fragrance, it leans more toward a softer feminine scent in my eyes. The metal spray atomizer is unique, dispensing widely and evenly. I find just a few sprays to be the perfect amount for longevity without being too bold. However, I was captivated with the pleasant transfomative notes throughout the day, although milder by days end. I have received several compliments while wearing and am definitely intrigued to try other scents in this brand, as well.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Juliette Has A Gun has done it again with this perfume! This a nice warm, spicy, cozy scent. It’s perfect for fall and winter. It is such a nice cozy homey smell, guaranteed to get compliments everywhere you go!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: When I first received this scent and read that it was unisex I wasn’t sure how I felt about it. It has a very musky scent, amber like but with a very subtle sweet undertone. I tried it for a few weeks and I really grew to love it! On my skin it takes on a sweeter tone and I’ve received many compliments when wearing it, does not smell like a cologne at all as I was afraid it would. Smells sexier and heavy for sure but not masculine.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Ode to dullness is the scent of fall in a bottle!! I fell in love the moment I smelled how warm and cozy of a fragrance this is. It is a perfect fall fragrance that makes you feel cozy and warm. I have been wearing it every day since I got it and it is long lasting. I usually apply it in the morning and by the end of the day the scent is still on me. This fragrance is one that can be enjoyed by anyone. It's a unique scent that I wouldn't think I would have enjoyed but all it took was one spray of this fragrance for me to fall in love with it. Now lam obsessed with it and can't get enough of it. I would definitely recommend you try this fragrance if you love fall as much as I do. It will definitely become one of your favorite fragrances.

reviews.review_title: Love the bottle but the scent isn't right for me
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Its visually great. The bottle is boldy colorful with a catchy metallic print. Personally, the scent is not one id choose for myself.  PROS: The bottle is pretty. The colors are deep and bold, yet sort of neutral. The cap is heavy duty and feels like it has substance. The sprayer is my favorite part. It provides a long and ample puff of frangrance, which is nice compared to some sprays that just give a tiny spittle of mist. Id caution anyone using it to spray on their clothing or chest to try it on your wrist skin first. One spray on my wrist and it was wet enough to rub around wherever i wanted it and if you are wearing a chiffon or silk material, it may leave a mark where you spray. CONS: The name. Ode to dullness?..Doesnt make me want to buy. Juliette has a gun sounds pretty awesome but then dullness?... im not quite getting there with that one.  The scent is nice but a tad to soft/delicate.  Its more of a powdery/floral scent that falls a bit flat compared to the bolder scent i typically wear. Its missing a sweetness or edge... something to push it over the hump.  Its just kind of dull so maybe the name isnt so bad afterall. Its not a bad scent by any means, just not one id buy personally.  Perfumes are like movies and makeup... not everyone has the same taste. Smell for yourself. Based on the scents ive come across, I imagine this will be popular and overall pretty well liked, but personally i prefer something memorable and bold versus a soft whisper that could be potentially mistaken for clean laundry scents.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This perfume smells so so incredible. It has a muskiness to it that is so good for fall while still feeling very fresh and clean. I love it so  much as a transition out of my summer beach perfumes. It lasts a pretty long time but not the whole day, which I don’t mind all that much. I would spray probably about 5 sprays on myself to get the level of scent that

This is like the business casual of the brand's fragrances- inoffensive, polite, and acceptable for most places and situations. It's powdery and soft. It can come off as a bit bland, especially if you like more complex fragrances. I believe it's listed as unisex, but to me it is more similar to fragrances generally classified as feminine.

reviews.review_text: This is my absolute favorite. It’s subtle and not very sweet. However it is long lasting. I a little goes a long way. I will absolutely repurchase this.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I was excited to receive the Juliette has a gun fragrance as I’ve tried a couple of their fragrances before. I was really intrigued about this because it has notes of sandalwood, tonka bean and cashmere which are some of my favorite notes in fragrances. Surprisingly this reminds me of the other Juliette has a gun fragrance Musc Invisible which is one of my favorite scents. They both have that musky powdery scent to them but ode to dullness is just a little more cozy l, definitely see where the cashmere and amber come to play. This is a really good fall scent. One thing I will not is that this scent does not have a big projection like musc invisible but the scent does linger, it’s just more of a soft skin scent that you get hints of throughout the day. I really like it and glad it’s an addition to my collection.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This is definitely a grown-up scent that lasts a good amount of time. You don’t need to put a lot on, but it’s not super overpowering. I would definitely recommend this to anyone looking for a good date-night scent.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, auburn hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I recieved Juliette Has A Gun, ODE TO DULLNESS for free, from Influenster and Juliette Has A Gun,  in exchange for my honest review. Let's start with the packaging. The way the outer box is designed looks very luxurious. The color changing combo of colors is beautiful! When it comes to the perfume itself, it definitely isn't dull at all. The first scent I could pickup on was the Cashmere. It's strong initially. Then after a few seconds of being on the skin it has a really nice sweet aroma to me. I'm loving this perfume. It's really a unique scent. As far as lasting power goes,  it last for several hours with one spray. Overall, this perfume is great from the ground up.

reviews.review_title: Great clean scent that I can’t get enough of!

I got into the car with a date and he immediately asked what scent I was wearing and was obsessed! After wearing it for a while, I love the scent. It is crisp and clean and not too overwhelming. I don’t know how I would feel about it worn by a guy, but it might smell differently on them. Overall, I’ve added it to my rotation now!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Rich skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This perfume is very different from my usual vanilla gourmand scents that I collect but this is divine! I love it especially the cashmere note, it makes it so cozy. It is not a safe blind buy so I would smell it first.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: juliette has a gun has such polarizing scents! you either love them or you don’t. i get so many compliments while wearing this perfume, but i myself am still unsure if i absolutely love it. it has definitely grown on me since i first got it, and i have reached for it more and more over the last month. it’s a very clean fresh scent. i would say to the girls that are into the clean girl aesthetic: this one’s definitely for you! i received this fragrance complimentary from influenster but all opinions are my own.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, auburn hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I received this product for free from Influenster and Juliette has a Gun to give my honest review. Ode to Dullness  has key notes of  Badiane, Cashmere Flower, Tonka Bean. It has a nice  warm and enveloping subtle Spice to it that is pleasant. It stayed close to the skin for the most part, and dried down into a  warm cozy creamy sandalwood and sweet musk with a touch of spice. Very subtle and not at all over powering scent perfect for the upcoming colder months. I recommend this if you like subtle scents that lingers faintly but pleasantly. If you prefer strong and intense scents this may not be for you.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Deep skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I absolutely love the packaging and the bottle!! The fragrance itself was beautiful. It made me feel sexy. In my opinion it's more of a fall scent but I will be wearing it all year. Overall it's a must buy!!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, auburn hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I’ve owned a JHAG perfume in the past and I loved it then and boy do I love it even more now! This perfume is not too strong but it has an amazing scent. The lasting power is also great, as I’m getting whiffs of it throughout the day. My favourite perfume that I own currently and I have quite a bit! Will repurchase when it’s empty for sure. My fiancé also enjoys it a lot on me so that’s a bonus!

I was super excited to get to try a perfume from the Juliette has a gun line.  Ode to Dullness arrived and my first thoughts were the packaging was spectacular and the bottle was beautiful.  I normally love this type of fragrance which says it has a cashmere flower, sandalwood and tonka bean which to me screams deliciousness.  However, once I applied it to my skin I immediately was hit with an overpowering strong scent that reminded me of a grandmother floral and a very over the top musky scent.  I thought maybe it would dry down to something more pleasant but I found that not to be the case.  I will say this perfume has a strong scent that lasts so I gave it 2 stars because of that.  Normally perfumes start strong and then dull as the day wears on.  This one had staying power so if you like the scent, this is a plus for you.  My husband also said it smelled awful so at least I know I wasn’t just over judgmental on it.  This will be a perfume I would not wear and will not purchase.

reviews.review_title: Ode to Dullness is life ordinary
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I truly enjoy wearing this fragrance. It has a perfect balance of elevation in beauty and being refined and just ordinary in life. It is beautiful to wear and long lasting. It’s not commanding and turning all heads for attention. That’s what I like about it. It’s completely wearable in confidence. Suits multiple occasions. I especially enjoy wearing it just for ordinary days, which are a frequent dose of how life is spent. I don’t find this as an identity like someone old or young or sexy or masculine. It’s named dullness as an expression. It’s wonderfully dull. So glad I gave it a chance on me. The bottle and packaging are also very nice. This will be my most worn fragrance.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is a lovely sophisticated fall/winter scent. A little goes a long way. It is a fragrance that is truly tenderness - I’d have no issue sharing with my husband.   I received this product from Influenster in exchange for my honest review.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Oily skin

It lasts around 5 hours on my skin but I could still smell it the next day on my clothes. It’s also one of the only fragrances I’ve ever been complimented on by a stranger.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, red hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love this perfume. I was so pleasantly surprised by how well the scent matched my needs. Subtle but bold enough to stick throughout the day and not be too overwhelming. This is great for everyday use but will also work for special occasions.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received the Juliette Has A Gun - Ode To Dullness Eau De Parfum complimentary for reviewing purposes in the 1.7 fl oz size. I absolutely adore this comforting and cozy scent, especially in time for fall/winter. It’s warm, spicy, and floral musk. The notes are badiane, cashmere, flower, tonka bean, and sandalwood. Since receiving the perfume, this has been my go to evening scent, it’s just amazingly cozy and I love the cashmere musk. I will be repurchasing this, thank you so much Influenster and Juliette Has A Gun. Will add this to my growing collection of JHAG!

reviews.review_title: Soft, cozy scent. Like a soft sweater feels
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received this to review for my honest opinion. Love this scent. It is such a soft and cozy scent. Still long lasting but smells like a cozy sweater fees.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I'm not just saying this for the review, Juliette Has A Gun Ode to Dullness is an amazing scent and definitely my new fave perfume. It has sandalwood, which is my all-time fave scent. You can smell musk, floral, maybe a bit of sweet. I don’t know scents well enough, but definitely musk and floral. The bottle is also really cool! This might be silly, but I really like that the cap is magnetic, so it latches to the bottle. It gives me comfort since I tend to break things. Again though, the perfume scent, it's absolutely wonderful. I wear it every day and my husband loves it, too! I highly recommend Ode to Dullness, truly. You just might love it!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brunette hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: on skin is definitely better than on clothes. There is a note in here that just doesn't go well with me.  I would say that this is a fail blind buy(try in store before buying). I don't think it smells like laundry detergent or clean. it is just woody, sweet and a bit spicy. I really don't like it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have been using this perfume for a few weeks now and I am enjoying the warm, clean, sexy notes it has. I find myself catching the scent throughout the day. It's not too heavy or strong.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This perfume is really nice. It has a nice scent. It’s not to strong like some perfumes are. And the scent last all day when you are out and about. I think this is great for yourself or to give as a gift to someone you know.

reviews.review_title: A warm, spiced wood of luxury
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This was my first introduction to Juliette Has A Gun, and it was a fast love. The scent sprays strong but it settles very nicely once it dries down on the skin. The sandalwood and Freesia stand out the most to me, with an after of musk that doesn’t overwhelm but does hug your senses nicely.   The packaging is my favorite I’ve seen. The beautifully dark bottle is encased in thick foam, like a card almost. The engraving of the name on the outside of the foam, in the card stock wrap made it feel as expensive as it should. It also gives the clutz in me comfort knowing it’s protected a bit more than the standard perfume box. The bottle itself is beautiful with its blue to red gradient and shiny silver labeling.   Finally, the spray on this bottle is phenomenal. It’s a wide spray, with a lot of volume. Two sprays is the most I’ve used and the longevity has been out of this world for scent. Easily an all day wear.   While it’s a pricey perfume for some I can comfortably say it’s worth the cost in scent, wearability, and longevity.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The Juliette has a Gun, Ode to Dullness scent, has been a good perfume. I like it! It smells good, and lasts a decent amount of time as well on the skin. I would describe the scent as musky & floral, with hints of vanilla. A lot goes a long way, so it will definitely last a while! The packaging is so pretty, the bottle is simple yet beautiful; a great addition to any perfume lover’s collection.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Juliette Has a Gun's 'Ode to Dullness' captivates with its subtle spice scent. A harmonious blend of floral and earthy notes, it's a quiet, sophisticated companion that lasts all day. The minimalist packaging adds to its understated charm. Perfect for those who appreciate a refined, spice-infused fragrance.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I'm not sure I've ever described a perfume as cozy, but that's the first word I think of when I smell Ode to Dullness. It has a really subtle, sweet and warm smell. It's long lasting and I've gotten multiple compliments! One of my new favorites. The bottle feels really nice and heavy and is beautifully colored.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I love this fragrance it’s so cozy! Definitely on the sweeter side but not make you sick sweet. It has just the right spice and wood mixed in to make it amazing. The only thing I wish was a little better was the longevity after about 4-5hours I notice it fading away.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is a great fragrance! It has a spicy yet sweet undertone. I do wish that it lasted a little longer. I spray it on before I leave and I can't smell it a couple hours later. The packaging is great too!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Smells so good! It had a warm and inviting scent that isn’t too overwhelming. It’s my new favorite!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, red hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This scent is delicious! I received it from Influenster to try. You get all the notes they mention in the description. In my opinion, the sandalwood is what comes through the most. Most importantly, a little spritz goes a long, long way! I sprayed once on my wrist and my boyfriend could smell it in a different room.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Gray eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: After my favorite replica was discontinued (dancing on the moon) I gave up on finding a replacement. This is the perfect replacement bought blindly and surprisingly has same notes of florals and minerals with a hint of vanilla and musk perfect scent for Fall and winter

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This perfume is a good scent. My husband loved it on me, but it is a bit too musky/woodsy for it to be a favorite of mine. I think it smells great, but it isn’t for me.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I absolutely adore this scent. It's my daily user for me. Strong scent but definitely date night vibes.  I did receive this product as a free sample

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brunette hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin

It might just be my preferences (I don't always enjoy musks), but this seems uninteresting... Dare I say, dull? It's not BAD, it's just not something I would spend my money on. I was sent this product free for review, but all opinions are my own.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I wasn’t sure what to expect when I heard the name of this perfume, but I was pleasantly surprised. It’s a comforting, warm scent. Great for fall, and anything but dull.
