First time receiving and testing out this perfume. Smells so good, I was worried if I wasn’t going to like it because I’m very picky with perfume scents. This scent reminds me of a warm ,cozy evening 9/10.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Ode to Dullness is a unique scent that’s perfect for Autumn and Winter! This perfume is rather strong, so a little goes a long way which I really appreciate. It’s sophisticated, sexy, and reminds me of a more feminine take of men’s cologne.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This isn’t my normal go to scent, but I am pleasantly surprised how much I love this. This has become my daily pick. Only wish the scent lasted longer.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: The perfume smells amazing. Like the “not a perfume” scent but with a twist. To me it smells fresh and sweet, with hints of spice. It’s perfect for fall and lasts all day long.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Overall a nice light scent, somewhat overpowering at first (gave me a slight headache) but wears more softly throughout the day. Has a clean floralish musk scent that I received many complements on. The bottle looks beautiful on my countertop too!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, auburn hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This smells amazing! Perfect scent for fall and everyday wear. Not overly strong which I like but still can definitely smell it. It also lasts a while without having to reapply. Absolutely my new favorite perfume by

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is a nice Autumn scent for anyone that wants to smell a little spicy this time of year. The scent lingers and has staying power but the undertones of musk that carry through this scent are a little too overwhelming for my liking.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I have the original Juliet has a Gun and I love it, so I was super excited for this one. It’s the perfect fall scent. It’s deep and musky with a bit of spice. It’s lasts all day on me. Would recommend!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: If you want to get many compliments Juliette Has A Gun Ode to Dullness is the perfume for you. It is the perfect fall- cozy- cuddle scent. A little goes a long ways. Perfect for a girls night out, date night or even running errands. It honestly lasts all day. It is a high quality perfume worth every scent. Even the packaging is pretty, as well as the bottle.

reviews.review_title: A definite must have for fall and winter!!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, auburn hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I got this product from Influenster in exchange for my honest review. Another Juliette has a Gun scent that has me sold!!! I love this brand! This one is definitely a fall/winter scent for sure! I love putting this one on after I take a shower or bath. It makes me feel like I’m enveloped in a warm hug. It’s a very cozy scent without being all overpowering. It’s soft and sweet. It lasts a long time on me and makes the people I want to get close get closer.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love all the perfumes in the Juliette Has A Gun collection, but this is by far my FAV!!! I sprayed it on in the store and IMMEDIATELY brought it to the counter to buy. It lasts SO long too!! JUST BUY IT

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Sooo. I have a lot of perfumes. I think the QUALITY of this perfume is great and I think most people would like it. They staying power was impressive - I smelt it 5-6 hours after applying and it was going strong. Ultimately I am  returning though as this though as it’s just too sweet for me. It’s a little less clean than I was expecting and more sweet. It would be great for those that want a nice, sweet spicy winter scent.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: “Ode to Dullness” doesn’t sound appealing but this fragrance is anything but dull. Notes include badiane (star anise), tonka bean and cashmere flower. Doesn’t have the bite of actual star anise but definitely a staple ingredient in Asian cuisine. Tonka beans are actually banned imports in the US but it’s supposed to smell like vanilla and almonds, contributing to the warm scent profile. Definitely evokes warm fall nights at first but after a while, it sort of smells like a carpet cleaning agent used at my elementary school. Cashmere flowers are native to China and its leaves are often used in East and Southeast cuisine. The leaves are sometimes described as malodorous but it’s one that I grew up with. If you’ve eaten Vietnamese pho before, you’ll be familiar with this particular leaf. I usually associate warm and spicy scents with a heaviness but the lightness is definitely appreciated. Lasts about 4 to 6 hours on me; I don’t smell it at all by the end of a typical work day. Overall, I like the scent but it’s not going to be my signature scent any time soon.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: A fragrance with a story!! This is one of the most mysteriously aromatic fragrances yet! I loved that this fragrance took on different heightened notes with the changing of the day and moments that we relate to as a part of both daily life in addition to special events that are celebrated.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I received this product free from Influenster and Juliette Has a Gun in exchange for my honest review. This has become my going out perfume. It is a floral scent but not too sweet or over powering. It is long-lasting, you will smell good all night. I asked my husband if it was strong smell he said yes but in a good way. So don't spray too much!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received this product for free from Influenster and Juliette Has a Gun in exchange for my honest review. I fell in love with the Ode to Dullness perfume from the very first moment I received it and started using it. The packaging is very impressive, it has three different colors blue, gray and burgundy; it looks divine. It has a sweet aroma, it’s scents seem to be the star anise and cashmere flower. So I’d considered it spicy & cozy… It is long lasting, at least for 24 hours, again you’ll fall in love with it. 100% recommended.

reviews.review_title: Newest addition to my perfume rotation!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love this perfume. It’s the perfect mix of floral notes without being overwhelming. It has a slight musky smell, but still an overall sweet scent. This is the newest addition to my perfume rotation. I always receive compliments about how great I smell while I’m wearing this. Overall, couldn’t be happier!  I received this product free of charge in exchange for an honest review from Influenster.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I received this product free from Influenster and Juliette Has a Gun in exchange for my honest review. I am very thankful to have had the opportunity to try this perfume. It was my first trying a product from this brand.  Juliette Has a Gun-Ode to Dullness is wrapped in a sense of mystery. It has a musky scent. Usually I don’t like perfumes that are musky but this one has its charm and is very alluring.  When I first put on the perfume it momentarily had a strong alcohol scent. After the alcohol faded, I was met with a very pleasant aroma. In the description of this fragrance, it states that it is a “cozy scent” and I have to agree. It feels like a fragrance suitable for fall. This perfume is transformative. When put on this fragrance I picture myself as a woman of grace, and charm, wearing a white fuzzy sweater, an ankle length gray skirt, a black and white houndstooth peacoat, oversized black framed sunglasses, and a black cloche hat spritzing the perfume on myself. I am transported to another time, the 1920’s and I am waiting on a train to take me on an unknown destination of adventure and intrigue on a beautiful fall evening.  One of the notes in Juliette Has a Gun-Ode to Dullness is sandalwood, a scent I quite enjoy. It is earthy and enchanting. This perfume is floral and musk based.  Lastly, the packaging is done very well. It looks very luxurious. The only negative note I have is that the lid to the perfume is super difficult to remove from the bottle.  I really like this perfume and will add it to my rotation of perfumes.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I LOVE this scent. It’s slightly manly smelling but still very feminine. I’ve been grabbing this daily since I received it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Thank you to Influenster for introducing me to this brand! I received this product in exchange for my honest and non-biased review. This scent was great for work as well as for a dinner date out. It’s not too strong, but is long-lasting! I have definitely added it to my rotation for this season.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I've never heard of this brand of fragrance. This scent is soft enough to not be overpowering but fragrant enough to last all day. The cashmere and Tonka are such an amazing mix. The fragrance is also unisex which is great. I do feel like it is a bit more feminine in my opinion.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This fragrance isn't what I'd usually go for, but I do think there's a possibility it'll grow on me. I'm usually apprehensive when it comes to new fragrances on me. It's very fall-cozy, but not in the sense you'd think. It does have a hint of febreeze to it lol but it's not bad. Veryyyyyyy warm and dark.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brunette hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I really liked the Juliette Has A Gun Ode To Dullness perfume. It was a pleasant scent that I could wear daily. I felt it also layered well with my other fragrance. I will day it did take me a few times before I really felt like I liked the scent. It is definitely very warm and I think it will be great for the colder months.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I tend to not wear a fragrance, as strong smells can bother me, but I really like Ode to Dullness. It does smell a little like alcohol when I first put it on, but it does fade quickly. The scent is comforting. Slightly sweet, with a warm, cozy feeling. I’ve seen others say it can smell like a dryer sheet, and while I don’t think it smells Ike that, it does give me the feeling of fresh clothes, so maybe it’s the feeling of clean clothes. The scent really does last all day, which is nice, and it wears well.  Pleasantly surprised with this one, but I do think it’s best smelled in person, as there’s not really the correct words to describe it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: At first I wasn’t sure of the scent but the more I wear it the more I fall In love with it. I love that it’s gender neutral as well. Has a warm cozy scent perfect for the fall and winter months. Every time I smell it I get a different note of the fragrance which smells lovely.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The bottle is very pretty with the red and blue ombré color. As for the scent, it smells very nice with a scent of cashmere flower or floral sweet.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I’ve worn this perfume several times since receiving it through Influenster. It’s warm, cozy, and floral and is the scent equivalent of wearing a white cashmere sweater over a floral dress.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I had no idea what to expect when I received this product, as I've never tried any scents from this brand before, but wow. I love this scent! It is lovely. Not too light but not too heavy. Can certainly be built up if you're looking for that. I get lots of compliments when I wear it out. It is perfectly vintage and timeless, without smelling like the perfume you dug out of grandma's closet.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I really enjoy this perfume, it smells very rich. It reminds me of shopping in Saks Fifth Avenue on a Saturday.  To me it does lean a little but masculine in the best way. Definitely a warm/ perfect for fall scent.  The bottle does look gorgeous among my collection also.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Amazing! My new go to scent. Its a cozy but sexy scent.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brunette hair, Porcelain skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love this parfume. Smells great. Has a slightly masculine scent but is very warm and cozy. Lasts all day. Excited to wear this all fall and winter!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love love love this scent! It smells nice and clean, I feel elegant wearing it. It reminds me of one my partner wear and I just love it! It is sweet and warm! My favorite perfume, especially for the fall season!!!

reviews.review_title: Warm clean laundry in a masc way
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, red hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: While it smells warm, and I understand the coziness people speak of, it’s just too masculine smelling for me. I love frags like baccarat, clean reserve skin, phlur father figure and tangerine boy, atelier vanille insensee, mimosa and cardamom. This one had a laundry smell with musk but it came off too masculine for me.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I really have enjoyed using this fragrance. It has a nice smell. I feel like it lingers on me throughout the day better than some higher end perfumes. I even got complimented walking throughout Dollar Tree one day! Lol I received this item as a free sample.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Smells quite masculine, my husband said it smells like soap from a hotel. Not what I was expecting but not terrible.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I really enjoy the scent of this perfume. It’s not too strong, nor too light. It’s the perfect fall/winter fragrance. It smells warm, a little musky and mostly floral, with a hint of vanilla.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Juliette’s Ode to Dullness is anything but dull. It has a very unique scent to it, a little floral with a touch of musk. It’s very unique and that’s what really sold me on it. It lasts a long time and I’ve had many compliments from people about this mysterious scent.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, auburn hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Juliette has a gun ode to dullness  has a very western feel, with the almost a leathery scent. I got this to try from influenster.com. It’s nice though I feel it’s not for everyone. I do like it myself. I wear it when I go out and I have one it to work. I definitely recommend it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I was intrigued by the name of this perfume, Ode to Dullness, and decided to give it a try. I was pleasantly surprised by how much I liked it. It is not a dull fragrance at all, but rather a subtle and sophisticated one. It has a creamy and cozy scent that is perfect for the fall and winter seasons, when you want to feel warm and comfortable. The perfume opens with a fresh and spicy note of badiane, also known as star anise. It adds a touch of brightness and contrast to the otherwise soft and smooth composition. The heart of the fragrance is a delicate blend of freesia and cashmere flower, two floral notes that are not very common in perfumes. They create a gentle and feminine impression, with a hint of sweetness and powderiness. The base of the fragrance is a rich and sensual mix of sandalwood and tonka bean, two ingredients that are known for their creamy and woody qualities. They add depth and warmth to the perfume, making it last longer on the skin. Ode to Dullness is a fragrance that celebrates the beauty of simplicity and minimalism. It is not loud or flashy, but rather elegant and refined. It is a fragrance that invites you to slow down and appreciate the small things in life. It is a fragrance that wraps you in a cozy halo, as the brand describes it

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Ode to Dullness by Juliette Has a Gun is one of my new favorite perfumes. There's something warm and comforting about the scent. I can smell a bit of floral and musk. There's a scent that I can smell in the undertone that is both unique and intriguing to me. I would say it's more of a sophisticated scent. The lasting power of this perfume is really impressive. I also really love how pretty the bottle is. This is my first time trying a perfume from this brand and I'm now curious about their other scents.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: New favorite scent and it is not even close. I am not much of a floral perfume person, no matter how much I keep trying, and this ode to dullness was an instant favorite. The floral scents I commonly find in popular perfumes are often too strong for me, and can give me a headache. If you feel similarly about very floral perfumes, give this musky scent a try! I previously have feared a musk fragrance would smell too masculine, but this one is feminine and warm smelling.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, red hair, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This scent is so interesting to me! It honestly took me two wears to decide how I felt about it, but I really like it! It had some unique notes I was unsure of but the second wear it grew on me, and my partner liked how it smelled on me as well which is a bonus! The name seems ironic to me because it’s anything but dull.   My only small critique is that if did not last a super long time on me, but that varies person to person. I would definitely recommend this scent to friends and family, especially those who have many perfumes and want something different.   I received this item through influencer to test for review.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I absolutely LOVE this scent. It reminds me of curling up on a crisp fall day covered in blankets and throw pillows sipping a hot cup of coffee. It has a gorgeous musky, gourmand scent that is absolutely delicious layered with a vanilla lotion. In addition it is long lasting and I get compliments all day long. I’ve had multiple people come up to me and ask what I was wearing. Once I run out of this bottle I will be repurchasing my own, because this is definitely going to be part of my core collection of fragrances because of its comforting, cozy vibe.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brunette hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I wasn't a fan of this fragrance when I first got it as it smells like air freshener but I gave it some time and tried it for a couple of weeks and it warmed up to me it smells like freshly clean laundry like a cozy blanket in a fall/winter night I do think it's not a every day fragrance but more of something you could wear when you want a break from life spray some on and you will feel like your cuddling a warm blanket  I received this product  as a free sample in exchange of honest review

reviews.review_title: Warm and Velvety, the perfect Fall/Winter Scent!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is a perfect fall or winter scent! It has a warm and spicy tone to it and feels like it would go perfectly with an all-velvet look or wrapped up in a faux fur coat. The star anise blends with the tonka bean to add a rich tone to this scent, while the cashmere flower balances and helps it all seamlessly blend together! I also love that while it is a warm and spicy scent, it's not overpowering. It's subtle and effortlessly sexy and would smell great on anyone regardless of gender.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Medium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Brought me into the realm of autumn with the notes of cashmere, sandalwood and tonka bean. If velvet had a smell, I would think it would be exactly this. The scent lingers longer than expected so no need to spray a lot. Perfect for fall and wintertime.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Great fall/winter scent. This is filled with cozy notes of sandalwood and tonka bean. It will make you want to take a trip to the pumpkin patch and then cuddle by the fireplace after. It’s soft and sensual. Not loud and overpowering. I love it!

reviews.review_title: Lovely scent that's not too overpowering
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I really love this perfume. It is light but has so much dimension. With velvety notes of Star Anise, Cashmere Flower, Sandalwood and Tonka Bean it's the perfect Fall scent. It is cozy smelling and the scent wraps around you like a comfy cashmere sweater.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, red hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This has a nice fall/winter scent to it. It has some feminine and masculine notes, so it could be worn by either sex. It reminds me of a cozy sweater on a cold night.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: A unique, warm, cozy scent. Creamy, velvety and slightly musky. The perfect scent for fall/winter. A subtle smell of sandlewood, and cashmere flower. Although, a beautiful scent it did take some “getting used to” for me to like and for that I give it a 4/5. A beautiful bottle perfect for man or woman!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brunette hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This new scent is anything but dull. Theres  many  amazing smelling layers to decipher.  At first it smells floral, but then the scent  merges to a deeper powdery scent, followed by rich, sweet, vanilla,  finally  it ends with just a bit of spice. I get compliments everywhere I go.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received this sample in exchange for an honest review. I absolutely love it! It is perfect for anyone who loves floral scents and is looking for a fall/winter scent. It is a warm, floral with a hint of pine.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love love love this scent. It's light, flirty and amazingly lasts all day for me. In addition to the lovely scent, those who are tactile like me, you will enjoy the heft of the bottle and snap of the cap. As I said all good things!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This is the first time I've tried a fragrance by this company and I have been sent this for free in exchange for a review. First, the scent. It's a nice and sweet, nearly creamy scent with notes of flowers. I've never had a fragrance with this kind of mix and I'm in love with it. The bottle is cute and minimalistic enough to use as a decoration on my work desk as I work from home. As for the lasting power, I have used it when I went out and since I do not have a car, I've been walking everywhere. The scent has lasted me over two hours and even then, it still smells great. Highly recommend this and I'd like to explore more of their fragrances!

reviews.review_title: A scent that is anything but dull…
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I was so excited to have the opportunity to test this perfume. I have a hard time finding perfume that smells good and lasts. This  does both.  I’m in love with the soft floral and cashmere scents. It’s a wonderful balance of warm soft notes with a hint of brightness. Great as a year round scent.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I've been using this perfume for over a week now and I really like it. It's different from most fragrances I wear. It smells strong when you spray it on but once it settles it's perfect and not over powering. My boyfriend gives it a 9/10 🙂

reviews.review_title: It's like being wrapped in a warm, cozy blanket o
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Ode to Dullness is a perfume that oozes elegance and serenity & is anything but dull.   Upon first spraying, there is a sharp note to it that I don't care for much, but after a few minutes that note settles and what remains is  a soothing, spicy musk with a bit of beautiful floral. It's like being wrapped in a warm, cozy blanket on a crisp fall day... Truly an unexpected, beautiful scent.  The packaging is equally as beautiful with a muted blue to burgundy bottle that comes snuggled in a foam insert... the packaging oozes luxury. The mister produces a very fine spray and I've found that the perfume is so rich that I only need 1-2 pumps, which lasts all day.  This could be a unisex scent, but to me it leans more feminine. This has quickly become a new favorite scent in my collection and I highly recommend it to those who want something that is the perfect blend of unique yet comforting.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is a wonderful perfume! It really is unisex/genderless. My husband and I both like it. He thinks it smells more masculine, and I thought it smells more feminine. It even smells differently when each of us wears it. I'm not much of a fragrance person, and I really enjoy this one.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I feel like this perfume was made for me. It has a Warm smokey, cashmere scent with a hint of floral that combines perfectly to wear all day. The perfume did not give me a headache but I did have to reapply midway through the day. This is the perfect fall/ winter scent and it is packaged nicely so would make the perfect gift for those that don’t love the overly sweet scented perfumes. 5 stars from me and has quickly become my go to.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This scent is sweet with a hint of floral and musk. I really liked it and received many compliments. It’s long lasting and I still smelt it on my skin at the end of the day

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Just kidding. This perfume is like your everyday tee shirt bra that you can’t go a day without. It’s powerful enough to tell you have a fragrance on, but blends so incredibly that it doesn’t overpower or demand an audience! I love that I can throw it on even if I’m just going grocery shopping. The notes blend smoothly, none overpowering the other. I may start wearing it around the house as well!  I received this product complementary in exchange for my honest opinion.

reviews.review_title: Warm and musky with a little sweetness
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: For me this fragrance is warm, musky, woody with a little sweetness. It’s the perfect twist. I can describe it as warm, delicate and elegant. I think it’s perfect for autumn. Every time I wear it I get compliments.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, gray hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love this scent!  Will definitely be one of my top Fall go-to's!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Let me start off by noting 2 things - first is that I love perfume and have/have smelled a lot of different perfumes; second is to take all perfume reviews with a grain of salt as everyone's sense of smell, preferences, and body chemistry is different all of which goes into whether or not someone likes a perfume and how it performs on their body. Having said all that, I hated this perfume the first time I sprayed it (in the air), but it's been steadily growing on me, especially after spraying it on my skin. The initial scent is VERY powdery and musky to me and super strong. It did not give me a headache, but it was noticeable and I wasn't a fan. However the perfume really warms up/chills out on the skin into an ambery-vanilla that I do very much like. The sillage at this point is pretty light and you can really only smell it near the skin. On me the longevity is pretty short - 3 to 4 hours max, after which I can't even smell it when I press my nose to my skin. I wouldn't call this a safe blind buy by any stretch, but it's definitely interesting and if you're into musk/amber this might be for you! In general, I will say I love Juliette Has a Gun because I feel like their perfumes are always unique, not similar at all to other perfumes on the market.   I received this for free in exchange for an honest review.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I loved the scent of this perfum. The mix of sandlewood and cashmeremix nicely with florals to give it a sweet, light scent. I wear it everyday and would recommend to anyone who enjoys those smells!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I absolutely love this perfume! Every time I wear it I get compliments on how amazing it smells. It’s very subtle hints make this a favorite in my collection.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This product I received in exchange for my honest review from Influenster. The Tonka bean is the star of the show here and really shines and gives a deep warmth to this fragrance. This fragrance is anything but dull and is reminiscent of the iconic DKNY Cashmere Mist in that it gives you a clean, cozy hug. You will get multiple compliments on this fragrance as your scent bubble will extend out about 5 to 6 feet. It is not a beast mode fragrance by any means but shines nicely in the cold weathers. I do wish it lasted a bit longer but it does last about 4 hours.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: It's a touch of thrilling and sexy...  has the security of darkness and warmth. Beautiful scent that creates a beautiful feeling.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Medium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This perfume smells amazing! It's dark notes make it powerful but still being feminine. It smells very familiar but different at the same time

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I received this product for my honest review. This scent reminds me of the “not a perfume” scent but with a spicy, autumn twist. One spray lasts most of the day and I did not find it to be overwhelming. Perfect scent for fall and winter!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I received this product for free for my honest review. I received this for free for my honest review. The bottle is a really pretty ombre color! The perfume has a light musky and kind if woodsy scent, but it is pretty strong when you first spray it on. It lasts quite a few hours, and fades slowly over time. I would probably purchase this for myself.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Such a pretty bottle. The spray gives plenty with just one press. It’s not as long lasting as I would like but the scent is really nice. I was a bit disappointed in the foam packaging it came in. As a more expensive perfume I would expect a nicer presentation. But overall I like it!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: [I received Ode to Dullness 1.7 fl. oz Eau de Parfum by Juliette Has A Gun, from Influenster and Juliette Has A Gun in exchange for my honest review] The packaging on this perfume is to die for! It is   so luxurious. It came in an encased within a foam insert, embossed with the Juliette Has A Gun logo. That as soon as I opened the box I could smell the scent. It gives a warm cozy feel. I love the parfum’s bottle , it has an ombré blue color that makes it seem like dusk and makes it look luxurious. The notes/ aroma of sandalwood is the first thing i noticed with a hint of vanilla. This parfum is would be great for an evening out or during the fall or winter seasons it gives out fall vibes. At first spray it seems to much but as it settles it is heavenly! After trying the parfum, I would definitely recommend it to family and friends 10 out of 10

reviews.review_title: Great fragrance to add to your collection!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This perfume is a great scent to add to your collection. It’s long lasting scent makes it awesome! It strong and does have a light powdery scent to it. To me it’s more of a fall scent. Would recommend! I did receive this as a incentive to test and review for my honest opinion.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received this Juliette Has a Gun ODE TO DULLNESS for free for my honest review. The packaging and the bottle itself are very well made and look great! The perfume itself smells pretty good but  goes on pretty strong and doesn't last as long as I had wished. It has a faint scent of woodsy type smell to me a little but overall smells pretty good.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: First JHAG fragrance I've purchased and decided to only go for the travel size-- what a mistake because this is quickly becoming my favorite scent for when I want to feel cozy, I need to upgrade. Delicate slightly woody plush cashmere, like a million dollar blanket fresh out of the dryer. Slightly aftershavey in aroma too thanks to the anise note.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brunette hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Ok I tried these perfume for a couple days to see how I felt about this. This scent is not one of my favorites for me personally. It is like it says very cozy and warm. I think this can be a unisex perfume. I think the projection is just right not to much and considering how strong this scent is, it will not annoy you or others around if you end up liking  this perfume. I do think this is more of a mature scent. I can definitely appreciate  the beauty of this perfume, if you love tonka bean you will love this perfume.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This is my first time trying anything from Juliette Has A Gun but I have always been very curious about the brand since it seems very popular. First impression was I loved the bottle, the fade from blue to red is really cool. The fragrance itself to me is a a spicy musk and though I haven’t tried many musk perfumes I ended up liking the scent of this. I really love the spicy aspect of this fragrance and think I would wear it most in the fall and winter months. I do find this to be more of a skin scent, it doesn’t have a lot of projection and does fade a bit on me. I think this would be a great perfume to layer with others to make your own kind of unique scent!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I am a tried and true Lancôme perfume fan, but after trying this new scent I’ve  been hooked.  Ode to Dullness  is clean and warm all in one.  I love the hints of sandalwood, cashmere flowers and tonka bean. This scent is very unique and each time I wear it, I fall in the with the scent even more.

reviews.review_title: Juliet has quite the arsenal with this scent!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Oh my stars, Juliet has quite the arsenal with this scent! 🌟 I’m head over heels for this musky fragrance. The sandalwood note is a game-changer; it made me stand out at a singles event. I can’t stop thanking the universe because it attracted some top-notch guys. 🙌 And let’s talk packaging - it’s like a luxurious treasure chest for the senses. The little gun case vibe is pure fun, giving the phrase “loaded with style” a whole new meaning. 🤣 This brand is my new crush, and I can’t wait to explore more of their scents. If you’re on the fence, just go for it, sister! 10 out of 10 would recommend.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This fragrance is light, not overpowering. I haven’t read a description of it, so I’m not sure the exact notes. It seems floral and slightly sweet. The way it mists out of the nozzle makes it easy to control how much you get on you, so I never feel like it’s too strong. It also came packaged nicely, and the bottle is heavy glass with a two toned tint

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, gray hair, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I received this product complimentary from Influenster in exchange for my honest review. I love this fragrance so much! It’s such a warm and cozy scent and it lasts all day. I would describe this as a strong fragrance with notes of musk, vanilla, and wood being the strongest. I also really liked the simple, yet sophisticated design of the bottle. It’s easy to use and looks wonderful on my dresser. This will definitely be an everyday perfume for me and I’m so happy to have found it!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brunette hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Really quite nice. It's more of a masculine scent but still has that subtle soft sweetness of a feminine perfume. It's a very unique smell, and it doesn't describe well. I'd recommend it or at least going to the store to smell it. I really like it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received this product in return for my honest review. Juliet Has A Gun is one of my favorite fragrance lines and Ode to Dullness may be my new favorite. It’s not overpowering and is long lasting.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received this perfume complimentary in exchange for my honest review. Ode to Dullness is anything but dull. It’s richly scented with cashmere and sandalwood, tonka bean. One spray will do you! Beautiful packaging too!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: JHAG  Ode to Dullness is one of the nicest, most soft and wearable scents I’ve come across in a long time. It’s definitely a Fall/Winter scent. I’m a sucker for a gourmand scent-and I get that,plus vanilla,tonka,and an overall sweet musk that is just so wearable. It reminds me of a cashmere blanket,or a beautifully soft sweater. The bottle is delightfully heavy and the colors are a gorgeous ombré combination of blue,pink, and grey. I love the look of it on my vanity and have been wearing it truly non-stop since it arrived. My fiancé adores it and that’s always a plus! It wears close to the skin but I definitely have been complemented on it and catch scents throughout the day, so it’s got a nice projection. I find this to be in my top three JHAG scents-the others being Not A Perfume and Vanilla Vibes. It’s both sensual and casual. I love the idea of having a perfume made of the more “dull”,or commonly used notes,that is something all its own. I have already made a purchase for my mom for Christmas-it’s so perfect for her as well.  I adore this scent-give it a try.  I got this as a gift from JHAG,opinions are my own.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, auburn hair, fairLight skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I received this perfume in return for my honest review. JHAG Ode to Dullness is a pretty perfume. The packaging is great and the bottle is lovely. I really like the ombré colored bottle. The scent itself is lovely; it has a woodsy, amber spiced scent with a hint of anise. This is definitely a more mature woody, sweet scent that is great for fall. While I like this scent I don’t think it’s one I would reach for often. It’s just a bit too woodsy for my taste. I think a lot of people would really love this perfume, however it’s just not for me. As for the price it is on the high side, but a lot of perfume tends to be on the high side. The longevity of this perfume is mid-range; it lasted about 5 hours on my skin. I could smell it heavily for the first couple hours and then it just faintly dissipated. I would recommend this perfume to anyone who likes a woodsy, cozy scent.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Gray eyes, auburn hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I didn't like this fragrance when I first smelt it. It struck me right away as Grandma - but I wore it for the day and it grew on me.  It's musky and floral, heavy on the floral but it's dry down is very nice. I still get grandma vibes, but in the best way possible. It has a warm note in it that I can't put my finger on but it's so nice! I have been wearing it more days then not and get complimented almost daily.  I received this complimentary for my honest review.  It is distinctive in a way that I haven't smelt something quite like it before (and I have a lot of perfumes). I have enjoyed this tremendously, and the packaging is beautiful.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received this product for review from Influenster. If you like a clean woody scent you will like this scent. To me it can well be an unisex scent. At first spray it is kinda strong but it tames down pretty quick. Its not the most long lasting scent it last maybe a good 4 to 6 hours on the skin.

reviews.review_title: Beautiful, cozy and a little sexy
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love how this perfume smells. It is a little strong at the start but softens and warms into a truly wonderful scent. I got lots of compliments when I wore it from both men and women. I did deduct one star because it gave me a rather massive headache but that’s a me problem and is not an issue with the scent. This is one that I can see many different people enjoying.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Dullness has been preconceived as simple, but who says simplicity has to be a bad thing? Juliet Has A Gun Ose To Dullness has created a fragrance that comforts my body and mind. The top notes of the Badiane and Freesia entices me into a silent beautiful embrace. This fragrance effortlessly hugs my body softly in a warm hug with the heart notes of Cashmere Flower and Sandalwood.  My body slowly relaxes fully taking in the bottom notes of musk and tonka bean. Combined together the once mundane dullness transforms with light beauty and compelling subtle attraction. Soothing my senses in comfort and long lasting aroma.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I absolutely fell in love with this scent at first spritz. It’s musky with a floral undertone. I sprayed it on after the shower the first night I got it and I was still able to smell it the next afternoon. It’s not over powering like some perfumes I’ve gotten before and that’s what makes it perfect.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This scent smells exactly like Burberry Brit in the 2010s. I’ve been searching for a scent that was similar and have finally found it! The scent description is musky with hints of florals. It also smells unisex! Would definitely recommend wearing this

reviews.review_title: Elegant and yet simple enough for every day wear
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received this product for free in exchange for my honest review from Influenster and Juliette Has A Gun. As a self proclaimed perfume snob, I am thrilled to have been chosen for this VoxBox. Ode to Dullness is a warm and sensual fragrance that stays with you all day. It envelopes your senses like a cozy sweater on a chilly day with notes of cashmere and sandalwood. It is a fragrance that can carry you from a day in the office to a night out on the town.  The packaging and bottle are equally as sleek and elegant as the product inside. I am excited to try more from this brand.

reviews.review_title: Well paint me grey and call me dull!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Because this is it, no, seriously. I have bought so many perfumes and sets to explore in search of something that is hard to explain, but something just like this.   I am a diehard unisex cologne eau de parfum girl, my signature is angel Thierry mugler, a classic,   But this, THIS DAZZLED ME! After testing 100s of mediocres I have finally found another love, no bull, no hype, this is it. Musky, clean, sweet, it’s like wrapping up in a warm hug with your s/o and the scents just blend but you breathe it in and feel at home. I am obsessed.   Thank you infinitely Influenster and Juliette Has a Gun for gifting me my next forever scent!!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received this product free from Influenster to review. It's a nice, light scent and I think it's unisex. It lasted longer on my clothes than on my skin for some reason though. Not too heavy or overpowering.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I tend to like scents that are more on the “masculine” side (who decided that anyway?) and this definitely delivers. You get that burst of cashmere flower that’s a little musky but then this sweet tonka bean comes through to soften it. There’s almost a hint of vanilla in there too? It’s amazing. This is hands down my favorite fragrance in a while! It also lasts all day which is a huge plus. I’ve been getting so many compliments!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This is a perfume for WOMEN! It has a deep, musky scent with a hint of sweetness that makes it perfect for work, date night, or a quick refresher. Personally, I love this product. I would love to smell myself all day and I think the people around me would appreciate too.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: After using this for a few days, it has become one of my favorites. Everywhere I go, I get asked what I am wearing. A couple sprays lasts all day and then some. I love the bottle and the scent. Fresh and captivating.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The scent of this perfume is different, and it’s hard to explain, but it is a nice scent that lasts all day. It is very strong when you first put it on.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I am now obsessed with this fragrance. It’s definitely a fall winter vibe, and almost has a baby powder fresh undertone. It smells really clean, but also sexy and wintery. It’s a very surprising scent. It’s so pleasant and I get so many compliments when I wear it! It lasts hours also! I coach volleyball, so I’m usually running around and constantly active and the smell stays put! I love it!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brunette hair, Dark skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: As this isn't dull, it's not beyond either. It's very hard to explain but I like its difference. I have nothing in my collection like it. Very suitable for the fall good in an office environment.  Very fall hayride appropriate. I will be wearing this to probably into the winter also. I smell the freesia for sure and something else very clean smelling and hint of sandlwood.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Thanks to Influenster and Juliette Has A Gun for sending me this product in exchange for an honest review.  I’m a major Juliette Has a Gun fan, and this perfume is another knockout. First, the bottle is gorgeous, and it looks great on my vanity. They describe the perfume as “cozy”, and that’s the perfect word for it. It’s got that classic JHAG “spice” to it, but it’s more warm and floral than the others. It really is like a sweater in scent form. Like all JHAG scents, it’s long-lasting, and you really only need one spritz to smell absolutely dreamy. This is the perfect cool weather scent.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This smells unlike any other perfume i personally have had, It is very sweet/gourmand smelling with maybe a hint of some spice..very difficult to explain and on the initial spray I didn’t think I cared for it, but once it dried down on my skin the smell was so cozy perfect for cooler weather. It’s got a nice musk and certainly isn’t for everyone.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This is a great scent for Fall/Winter. It's warm, but light and not overpowering or strong at all. Like others have said, its very cozy! The scent lasts all day but isn't super noticeable. I get headaches and migraines pretty easily, and some scents can definitely set it off, but this is so nice! It's the first time I've used their perfumes, but if they're all this nice, I think I'll check out the others as well! And the packaging is so nice!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This perfume smells so seductive. Totally gives cozy romantic date night vibes. It’s warm yet everyday wearable. Besides the perfume being lovely, the bottle is stunning. It holds its own next to the rest of my collection and makes a statement. Would totally recommend if you are into warm notes.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is one of my new favorite perfumes for a casual night out. I absolutely love the subtle warm scent it gives off thats very fragrant yet not overbearing like some of the brands out there. The bottle also looks very nice with the blue and red color desi

reviews.review_title: Will be in my scent rotation!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This smells amazing and will be in my scent rotation! It’s light, but also a little musky! Totally into it!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received this complimentary to try. This is a great new perfume in the Juliette has a gun line! It’s my third from this brand and just might be my favorite! It’s cozy and comforting, a perfect winter scent! It’s a clean creamy warm scent that’s definitely not overpowering.  It dries down to an inviting soft scent. One star off because I wish it lasted a little longer. Overall I would definitely recommend for the fall/winter!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: The first time I tried Ode to Dullness I sprayed it in the air and wafted it. I was immediately taken back to my teenage years when I finally found a perfume that was soft but sophisticated that I could wear every day. It doesn’t smell like an old lady but it’s powdery in the most gentle way. With the tonka bean really coming through on this spray.   The second time I tried Ode to Dullness I was applying it directly to my wrist. This woke up the scent and brought out what I think was the Cashmere flower.   I truly adore this scent and have been wearing it every day since it arrived. It’s a very comforting scent for winter and I’m glad it’s on my shelf.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is my new favorite perfume! I love that it is unisex and I see why now. It’s not too feminine or too masculine. I definitely smell the cashmere and sandalwood. It the perfect cozy scent.

reviews.review_title: Spicy/sweet and cozy nostalgia in a bottle
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I've been giving this perfume several days to try just to get an overall feel for it. It is a delightful scent, warm and almost creamy. It seems heavy at first,  but as the day goes on it lingers and it dries down to a very soft, slightly spicy, comforting smell. Somehow it reminds me of a perfume from Victoria's Secret when I was in high school... but in a good way?  If that makes sense at all. All of the people that I have to ask to give me a sniff have been delighted with the smell including my 2 sons that said quote the smell is so big it smells so good like tasty flowers and I can't stand it! All of that meant in a positive way, of course.  This scent is too heavy for spring and summer by my reckoning. It evokes the thought of warm sweaters, tall boots, and football games. That brings me to my only real beef with the scent- is name. Ode to Dullness seems clever, but can also seem like a snarky diss to people that would enjoy this scent.  Why alienate part of your market by calling them dull? Or bougie, or basic, or cheugy.  More than anything, this scent evokes nostalgia, and I don't see anything wrong with that.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love love love this scent! I was lucky enough to receive this in exchange for a review. As with the original Juliette Has a Gun fragrance, it seems this eau de parfum adjusts once you actually spray it on. It is sophisticated and expensive-smelling. Not too floral or musky, but a unique, modern blend. Beautiful packaging and bottle as you would expect.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, black hair, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I received Juliette has a gun: Ode to Dullness free for my review. I’ve used it for a few days now and love it! I initially sprayed too much and it lasted all day. You only need one spray so it will last a long time! The size of the bottle is great! I love the design! It smells great. Not too overpowering and lasts a long time!

The bottle is so sexy. The scent is very sensual, with hints of rose. I am obsessed with it, would highly recommend and plan to buy in the future!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I did not expect to like this perfume as much as I did. I am usually a fruity perfume girl but I am making an exception for this cozy, relaxing scent. I received this product in exchange for my honest review.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This fragrance is warm and cozy. It is the perfect fragrance for fall and winter.  This is my first fragrance from the line and I am impressed! The longevity is amazing!  It is strong yet subtle in the best way.  I would recommend this fragrance for anyone wanting a musky yet soft scent.

reviews.review_title: A comforting freesia scent with some warmth
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Imagine you’re winding down from spending a perfect, sunny day out shopping with friends. You get home and relax with a glass of beautiful Bordeaux before stepping into a piping hot bath. Any worries you had melt away. Did you doze? You did. But you’re just so comfortable.   When the water becomes too cool, you exist and enter the shower to get down to the business of cleaning. This is an everything shower, so you take your time. Beautiful French milled soap. Fluffy cotton wash cloth.   You emerge clean and revitalized. After putting on a stiff cotton waffle bathrobe, you sit down at the vanity. It’s skincare time. You complete your nightly ritual of lotions and serums. You’ve sat so long that you are completely dried off from your shower, and all that’s left to do is towel your hair a bit more and get into your pajamas.   No one is bothering you. No one is rushing you or complaining that you are taking forever.   You put on the softest pajamas you own. Warm and cozy, but also make you feel beautiful. You get into bed and the sheets are cold and soft. Starched cotton, just like a hotel. You are boneslessly relaxed. What a wonderful day to be you.   That is what this perfume smells like to me.  The notes I get most strongly are freesia and musk. It is a clean skin scent, a little soapy, but warmed by the cashmere. It lasts many hours, but gets a little powdery toward the end. Very pleasant, and in a pretty bottle. The cap has substantial weight to it which makes it feel a little more luxurious.   I am tremendously picky when it comes to fragrance and most give me a headache. This, however, I loved.  For me, it was also a bit nostalgic because the my mother always had freesia soap in the house when I was a child.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Medium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I received this perfume complimentary in exchange for my honest review. Juliette has a Gun Ode to Dullness beyond exceeded my expectations. I have a menagerie of perfumes, but this perfume very quickly became an instant favorite of mine! The scent is warm and inviting, perfect for the fall season with key notes including Cashmere flower, star anise, tonka bean, freesia, and sandalwood. The perfume bottle and packaging screams serenity and sophistication. I’ve received countless compliments while wearing this perfume and my husband loves it when I wear it! The perfume longevity is wonderful as I can still smell it hours after application of just 1-3 spritzes! Ode to Dullness will be a staple scent in my collection for sure. I absolutely love it!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This perfume smells so good. It lasts a very long time and is enticing to my senses.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, auburn hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received Ode to Dullness  Eau de Parfum from Influenster. It came in an encased within a foam insert, embossed with the Juliette Has A Gun logo. That as soon as I opened the box I could smell the scent. It gives a warm cozy feel. I love the parfum’s bottle , it has an ombré blue color that makes it seem like dusk and makes it look luxurious. The notes/ aroma of sandalwood is the first thing i noticed with a hint of vanilla. This parfum is would be great for an evening out or during the fall or winter seasons it gives out fall vibes. After trying the parfum, I would definitely recommend it to family and friends.

reviews.review_title: Smells Great, not Overpowering, & lasts for hours!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Love the smell of this!  I get compliments every time I wear it. It isn’t too strong & lasts for hours!  I will be purchasing again once I run out!  You regret purchasing this!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received Ode to Dullness 1.7 fl. oz Eau de Parfum by Juliette Has A Gun, from Influenster and Juliette Has A Gun in exchange for my honest review. Ode to Dullness arrives superbly packaged. The parfum's bottle is encased within a dense foam insert, embossed with the Juliette Has A Gun logo. It is then enveloped in an informative product sleeve of tagboard, and sealed in a protective vellum wrapper. The parfum’s bottle is made of thick, stunning, aubergine-blue ombre glass, that’s reminiscent of a midnight desert sky. Both the outer-cap and pump are chrome and project the shiny, eye-catching manuscript on the bottle. Just the appearance of the parfum bottle alone depicts luxury. After just one spritz, I was captivated by the allure and fell in love. The initial notes are spicy, intoxicating, and warm; the aroma of sandalwood stands out above all other. Once settled, the fragrance becomes relaxing, cozy, and embracing. There is a subtle hint of raw vanilla bean in a field of sweet, yet calming florals. While this fragrance would be perfect year-round, I believe it pairs best with the chilly Fall and Winter months. Ode to Dullness parfum is richly concentrated, and I found that just one pump/spritz to my wrist, and tap onto the other, delivered the optimal amount fragrance for an entire 12-hour day. With the number of compliments I received, and the long-lasting fragrance, I believe Ode to Dullness is well worth the price tag. After trying Ode to Dullness Eau de Parfum by Juliette Has A Gun, I am definitely interested in purchasing other luxury and quality fragrances by the brand, Juliette Has A Gun.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Fall into Winter, this is the perfect season to unveil this scent. I received this perfume as an incentive for my honest review, and baby, it did NOT disappoint. The warm, cozy, subtle sandalwood and elegant velvety notes of star anise will astonish you. It is long-lasting and leaves a trail of deliciousness along your path. There is a softness, and the openness is very much opposite of the name. It has a feminine divine essence. I would definitely buy this again as it has been inducted into my top 5 fragrances.

reviews.review_title: JHAG Ode to Dullness is a powdery scent
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Juliette Has A Gun Ode to Dullness First Impressions: This smells like a flanker of Carolina Herrera Good Girl except less annoying. Very much a Fall/Winter scent because of the heavy cashmere waft I get from it. Also, this fragrance reminds me of Burberry Her and Paco Rabanne Fame (both of which I would love if it were not for one note that nauseated me) So I'd say this smells better than those three I named because the note isn't super strong or offensive. As it settles, there's a soft powdery feel to it that stands out in the colder months. JHAG Ode to Dullness has major lasting power. I also believe that it would pair well with certain fragrance mists. So layering would be a great possibility. I will say that it definitely leans more mature.. I was asked for my honest opinion courtesy of Influenster.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I have a few mini bottles of this brand, and was super excited to find out this new scent was coming out! The packaging is gorgeous, and the bottle is heavy duty. I think this would be a great perfume for any time of the day!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I absolutely LOVE this scent. It is so good. It’s not overpowering and lasts a long time. Light scent. Very sweet but in a good way. 10/10 will by this.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I rec’vd this complimentary via Influenster in exchange for testing & review.  I am so glad I did as it’s not something I would have selected for myself. Sultry & deep. Smells like a steamy romance in a bottle. It has sweet notes but along the lines of a nutty vanilla, not sickly sweet/fruity, followed by sandalwood & musk. I tend towards fresh & delicate perfumes but I was pleasantly surprised by this one. Very feminine and womanly. A good Fall scent. Definitely working this into the rotation.  The packaging was classy & beautiful. What I’d expect of a high end fragrance.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The packaging is very nice and good quality. The scent it’s is light spicy and sweet. Good for younger girls who are just getting into fragrances. I prefer stronger scents so I’ll definitely layer it with something else. The notes are beautiful just wish ot was stronger

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I received this product for free from Influenster and Juliette has a Gun for my honest review.  First off, the bottle is so pretty. Both the bottle and the perfume remind me of a cool dusk at springtime.  The perfume is powdery and fruity. When I first spray it, it smells like the flowers from a grape vine near where I live. It has a juicy quality that the powderiness mellows out a bit.  The only negative is the longevity isn't quite there. Within an hour it becomes a skin scent, which is fine if you like fragrance to hug the skin.  Give this a try! It may be your thing.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This smell is so unlike any other perfume I’ve tried in the past but I love it! It is warm and inviting. I think this could be a day or night perfume. I get the most hints of sandalwood  but I do get the slight hints of freeesia. The packaging is also beautiful. Heavy duty glass with a good weight to it, the ombré effect of the grey and red is so eye catching and looks gorgeous sitting on my vanity.

This perfume exudes sophistication, warmth, and coziness, making it the ideal choice for cooler weather. I anticipate reaching for this fragrance frequently. The description, inviting us to slow down in the fast-paced life we live in,” is something I can stand by!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Oily skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin

He said it’s already one of his favorites! His reaction alone makes me loves this perfume. I like the smell a lot I would not describe it as spicy thou. It’s warm and comforting!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, black hair, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This perfume is very hard to describe! It smells good but it’s very… matronly. I feel like my grandmother would absolutely love this. It’s an older fragrance and I don’t think it’s much the style of younger generations. But it isn’t bad! It is flowery, to me anyway which isn’t something I’ve really seen people mention. When it dried down the only thing I can smell is flowers. I liked it a lot more when I first sprayed it because the musk and vanilla came out hard but when they dried away it was just flowers left. It is a kinda  scent and mixes well with the flowery, but i prefer more vanilla sweet scents like killian love don’t be shy and the green black opium. But all in all, I’d recommend it to people that like flowery, it’s so hard to describe!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin

When I first sprayed I mostly smelled freesia but on dry down the musks really came forward. On my skin the smell of tonka bean is the most prominent. This is almost like a soft knitted sweater in a bottle!

reviews.review_title: Ode to dullness bright to vibrant
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Combination skin

No there was a delight non over bearing smell that made me slow down and appreciate the sweet settle aroma that came from the beautiful bottle

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: “Hello Perfume Reader’s, I received this perfume from the Brand Juliette Has A Gun & Also Influenster. Thank you to both brands for sending, Rest assure I will always keep my reviews 100% unbiased. Let’s start off with the packaging, I’m giving 10/10. It was like opening a storybook, & the perfume bottle was the Story. The Brand launched in 2005 by the French born Romano Ricci. The perfume is created in France between Paris & Grasse. The Name of the Brand is a metaphor, Work from Shakespeare. A modern sense of empowerment, Sophisticated, but Sassy Woman, & the gun, her perfume. This perfume is definitely sophisticated, A older woman, This perfume is definitely warm & spicy. It reminds me of spices in your spice cabinet, It’s giving me a Fall Season with Fall Leaves, Sweater Weather, The Star ingredient in Badiance which is native to northeast Vietnam & Southwest China.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I recieved this from influenster for my opinion. The smell is very strong firstly...which i like, but others may not. It smells clean with a hint of sweet undertone in my opinion. I really like it and am going to now try other scentsm

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brunette hair, Porcelain skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: My initial impression of this was disappointment. When I took the cap off, it immediately reminded me of insect repellent.I was extremely hesitant to even spray it. But, I received this free to test and review from Influenster, so I had to. I'm so glad I did, though, because it's actually really good as long as you enjoy a stronger, warm scent. After spraying it, my first thought was that it was very creamy. But after drying down a bit, something a little sharper came out. It's a grandma scent, but in a really good way, reminiscent of Alien by Thierry Mugler. Excellent autumn scent.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Absolutely LOVE this fragrance!! It’s soft,with the perfect mix of sweet, fruity, floral & clean notes! I definitely recommend! I received this product complimentary in exchange for my honest opinion

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This was love at first spray! Creamy, powdery and slightly musky and sweet gourmand would be my description of this gorgeous scent. I’m extremely picky when it comes to fragrances, they must be wearable, yet unique - I don’t like to smell like everyone else! This scent evokes snuggling under a cashmere blanket, by a fire - it’s softly sexy and velvety. I can definitely smell the top notes (tonka bean, sandalwood and cashmere flower), and it settles into a warm, comforting, subtle smell on dry down and lasted for quite a while (sprayed on around 3pm and husband said he could still smell it on me around 10pm). I could see this easily being a scent that a lot of people would enjoy, it has both masculine and feminine qualities to me, and is not a strong or overwhelming scent. I think it would be perfect for everyday use, going to the office, first dates, because it’s a subtle yet charming scent. The bottle is beautiful too, it feels very substantial and the colors are gorgeous. Overall this will be going into my fragrance rotation and I’d recommend it!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I enjoyed this scent. It's sweet but also warm. I would describe it as a sweet but masculine scent if that makes sense. I definitely enjoy it and it wears very well and last a while.

reviews.review_text: I'm very excited to get this perfume to try. It's very subtle and not at all over powering. I'm very picky about fragrance, and while the scent is subtle it lingers and I can smell it on me for hours.

Staying power is great; and as it fades it lays beautifully and you almost can’t make out the difference between the perfume, and your natural scent. Couldn’t love this scent more! The bottle is heavy and looks great on my vanity.
